content.question: In Europe, political relationships of the type depicted in the image emerged most directly on account of which of the following developments?

choices.label: Local elites’ need for military protection from more powerful lords
Local elites’ desire to expand the commercial power of local towns
Local elites’ need for military assistance to eliminate religious heresies
Local elites’ desire to attract new settlers to their territories

content.answer: Local elites’ need for military protection from more powerful lords

topic.text: 1.6: Developments in Europe from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
